m_szDocTitle: GM unites car-sharing services under new brand 'Maven' | TribLIVE
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Print GM unites car-sharing services under new brand 'Maven' General Motors on Thursday, Jan. 21, 2016, announced it is launching a car-sharing service called Maven, where users will rent out shared vehicles at an hourly rate. Photo by The Verge By The Associated Press | Thursday, Jan. 21, 2016, 11:00 p.m. Email Newsletters Sign up for one of our email newsletters.
